name: Pick Up the Empties
description:
This game was built for two simultaneous jams: the 3-hour Trijam 153 and the Mini Jam 98 (a three day jam falling on the same weekend). The theme for both was "Empty" and the game needed to be somewhat rogue-like (or lite depending on your definition). 

I missed both deadlines, but spent the next few days finishing this silly mini game -- which was really just an excuse to do a jummbox cover song. 

WASD / ARROWS to move. or mobile touch. 

R - Restart / P - Pause / M - Mute / F - Full Screen

Apologies to Weezer :D
